resources.string: Talk to your ICODE Slix Card

All Lock and Password Protection operations are IRREVOCABLE settings that can't get undone by an unlock or reset operation.

 For that reason all Lock and Password Protection buttons are disabled by default. If you want to use these methods enable the functionality by putting the following switch to enabled.

 Locking can brick your tag, so use this option with extreme care - You have been warned !
